CPTheme(AbstractMethods) Category Reference

CPTheme abstract methods—must be overridden by subclasses. More...

#import <CPTheme.h>

Theme Usage

 Creates a new graph styled with the theme.

Detailed Description

CPTheme abstract methods—must be overridden by subclasses.
